metadata.title: CVE-2025-0240 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Parsing a JavaScript module as JSON could, under some circumstances, causecross-compartment access, which may result in a use-after-free. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 134 and Firefox ESR < 128.6.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
